subject: Learning
title: Beyond Flashcards: Other SRS Tools
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Beyond Flashcards: Other SRS Tools.

hook.text: Flashcards aren't the only spaced repetition tool. Journals, quizzes, and conversations can use the same principle.

buildup.text: Any retrieval practice can be spaced: practice problems, essay prompts, concept maps, even teaching someone else.

discovery.text: Spaced practice testsâ€”reviewing old exams at increasing intervalsâ€”are one of the most effective exam prep strategies.

twist.text: Cumulative reviewâ€”revisiting earlier course material regularlyâ€”applies spacing to an entire curriculum automatically.

climax.text: The principle is universal: space any retrieval activity. The format matters less than the schedule.

punchline.text: Spacing is the principle. Flashcards are just one format. Apply it everywhere.

quiz.question: What is the key insight about spaced repetition beyond flashcards?
options: Any retrieval activity can be spaced; the format matters less than the schedule
Only flashcards can effectively use spaced repetition
Spaced repetition doesn't work for complex material
